en: Delete one card from your deck
zh: 从你的牌组中删除一张卡牌

en: Upgrade one card from your deck
zh: 升级你的牌组中的一张卡牌

en: Draw one additional card each turn
zh: 每回合额外抽一张卡牌

en: Gain one additional action per round
zh: 每回合额外获得一个行动

en: Gain one additional equipment slot
zh: 获得一个额外的装备栏位

en: Choose an additional talent
zh: 选择一个额外的<<SpecialKeyword|talent>>

en: Dodge 20% of attacks in combat
zh: 在战斗中躲避20%的攻击

en: Upgrade all upgradable cards in your deck
zh: 升级你牌组中所有可升级的卡牌

en: Heal 2 damage each turn
zh: 每回合恢复2点伤害

en: Prevent one point of physical damage from each source
zh: 每个来源的物理伤害减少1点

en: Deal 2 fire damage for each attack card an enemy plays
zh: 敌人每打出一张攻击卡牌对其造成2点火焰伤害

en: Opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by 1
zh: 敌人的最大手牌数减少1

en: Dungeon Ability (cooldown 4):  Kill a non-boss monster, gaining experience but not gold
zh: <<SpecialKeyword|Dungeon Ability>>（<<SpecialKeyword|cooldown>>4）：击杀一个<<SpecialKeyword|non-boss>>怪物，获得<<SpecialKeyword|experience>>但不获得<<SpecialKeyword|gold>>

en: Dungeon Ability (cooldown 3):  May move through monsters until your next combat
zh: <<SpecialKeyword|Dungeon Ability>>（<<SpecialKeyword|cooldown>>3）：在下次战斗前你的移动可以穿越怪物

en: Dungeon Ability (cooldown 1):  Create a healing potion to add to your deck
zh: <<SpecialKeyword|Dungeon Ability>>（<<SpecialKeyword|cooldown>>1）：制造一个治疗药水并加入你的卡组

en: Your channel ability now gives 4 mana each use
zh: 你的【<<CombatAbilityName|Channel>>】<<SpecialKeyword|ability>>现在每次使用给予4点<<SpecialKeyword|mana>>

en: Your Kai Strike ability is reset and now has a cooldown of 2
zh: 你的【<<CombatAbilityName|Kai Strike>>】<<SpecialKeyword|ability>>被重置，现在<<SpecialKeyword|cooldown>>为2

en: Gain 5 life, 5 mana, and 1 action
zh: 获得5点<<SpecialKeyword|health>>、5点<<SpecialKeyword|mana>>和1点<<SpecialKeyword|action>>

en: Your channel ability now gives three mana per action card
zh: 你的【<<CombatAbilityName|Kai Strike>>】<<SpecialKeyword|ability>>现在每张<<SpecialKeyword|action card>>给予3点<<SpecialKeyword|mana>>

en: Your channel ability now gives four mana per action card
zh: 你的【<<CombatAbilityName|Kai Strike>>】<<SpecialKeyword|ability>>现在每张<<SpecialKeyword|action card>>给予4点<<SpecialKeyword|mana>>

en: Your damage is piercing
zh: 你的伤害是穿透性的

en: You are immune to most deck and hand manipulation
zh: 你对大多数卡组和手牌操作免疫

en: You start combats with a 5 point shield
zh: 你开始战斗时拥有5点<<SpecialKeyword|shield>>

en: Defeating a higher level monster reduces your dungeon ability cooldowns by an additional 1
zh: 击败一个比你高等级的怪物将减少你的<<SpecialKeyword|dungeon ability>><<SpecialKeyword|cooldowns>>额外1点

en: Dungeon Ability (cooldown 4):  Create a makeshift camp to rest, recover, and take notes
zh: <<SpecialKeyword|Dungeon Ability>>（<<SpecialKeyword|cooldown>>4）：创建一个临时营地用以休息、恢复并做笔记

en: Draw two cards at the start of each fight
zh: 每场战斗开始时抽两张卡牌

zh: 获得【 {value} 】<<SpecialKeyword|gold>>

en: GainHealth
zh: 获得【 {value} 】<<SpecialKeyword|health>>

zh: 获得【 {value} 】<<SpecialKeyword|mana>>

zh: 升级你的牌组中的【 {value} 】张卡牌
